response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time only, you can acquire this exceptional product at a price of $720,000. This represents an exclusive opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a reduced cost. I believe this offer presents a win-win situation for both parties and looks forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 720000}
